content: अभ्यस् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To practise, exercise; धन्यो वन्यमतंगजः परिचयप्रागल्भ्यमभ्यस्यति <ls>Māl. 9. 32</ls>; अभ्यस्यतीव व्रतमासिधारं <ls>R. 13. 67</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 107.</ls> {@--2@} To repeat, perform repeatedly; मृगकुलं रोमंथमभ्यस्यतु <ls>Ś. 2. 6</ls>; अभ्यस्यंति तटाघातं <ls>Ku. 2. 50</ls>; <ls>K. 183.</ls> {@--3@} To learn, study, acquire or learn by practice, recite, read; वेदमेव सदाभ्यस्येत् <ls>Ms. 2. 166</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 147</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 149</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 204</ls>; <ls>K. 79.</ls> {@--4@} To throw down upon, heap one upon another, accumulate, lay on (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--5@} To throw or fling at, shoot or aim at (as arrows).
